wishes.advice: It will take a lot of patience, empathy and humour. Also, try to assume good intentions.
The real sign of love is not the ability to read another's mind - rather, it probably is the willingness to explain and to listen calmly.
The dignity of compromise is built around the idea that in order to do certain important things we have to give up others: not everything nice is simultaneously available.
Frustration doesn’t just stem from things being difficult – only from them being unexpected and difficult.

We should be sad, but not angry or bitter. We must blame our partner and ourselves a little less. It’s not our fault or theirs. We’ve been judging our relationship by the exaggerated standards of fiction, rather than by the more more modest, and much fairer, benchmark of reality.
